attributes.additional_details: Honor the people that are in the middle of completion because the councils and solicitors have not been able to get the information required due to the covid and staff working from home. If contracts have been exchanged but maybe cant complete an extension could be given.
attributes.background: Extend the stamp duty which ends at the end of June.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Stamp duty holiday to be triggered upon exchange of contracts: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581308

Properties that have had an offer excepted will have the STLD holiday honoured: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563565

Extending Stamp Duty Holiday until December 31 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/583891

Extend the Stamp Duty holiday until June 21st, 2022: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584439
